articles.content: CD Projekt Red is delaying the planned 1.2 patch for Cyberpunk 2077. In a series of tweets, the studio explained that the recent cyberattack combined with the "extensive scope of the update" means it… [+1504 chars]

articles.author: Chris Kerr
articles.title: Valve ordered to comply with Apple's request for Steam data - Gamasutra
articles.description: A California magistrate judge has ordered Valve to comply with Apple's recent request for financial data on over 400 Steam titles.
articles.content:
A California magistrate judge has ordered Valve to comply with Apple's recent request for financial data on over 400 Steam titles. 
Earlier this month, Apple approached Steam for data about the year… [+1381 chars]

articles.title: PS5 Restock Updates for Target, Newegg, Walmart, GameStop and More - Newsweek
articles.description: The Sony PlayStation 5 console has been largely unavailable since it was first released in November 2020.
articles.content:
The PlayStation 5 was restocked at Target this week, though the console remains largely unavailable.
The PS5 console was first released in November 2020, but the next-gen Sony offering has not been … [+2893 chars]
